scripts.deploy-goerli: yarn auth && graph deploy --product hosted-service zkfairdomains/zkf-subgraph-goerli --network goerli
scripts.setup-studio-goerli: yarn codegen-goerli && yarn build-goerli && yarn auth-studio && graph deploy --studio zkf-subgraph-goerli --network goerli
scripts.setup-remote-goerli: yarn codegen-goerli && yarn build-goerli && yarn deploy-goerli
scripts.deploy: yarn auth && graph deploy --product hosted-service ensocean/ensocean-subgraph
scripts.setup-remote: yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn deploy
scripts.setup-studio: yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn auth-studio && graph deploy --studio ensocean
